description: A sanctioned entity is a record of a person or company that has been barred or prohibited from some activity, e.g. disqualified from being a director, banned from bidding for contracts, or is on a sanctions list

_88sanctions_list.description: The sanctions list from which this entry is taken
_88sanctions_list.title: Sanctions List

___jurisdiction.description: The jurisdiction covered by the register

___url.description: The URL of the sanctions list

___title.description: The title of the sanctions list

$eref.description: An entity which is a distinct organisation, but is not a company nor an individual. Examples include governments and governmental entities (e.g. Multilateral Development Banks, Government Departments, municipalities, etc), and also membership organisations

___other_attributes.description: Use for other attributes for which we don't yet have curated schema attributes

___jurisdiction.description: Name of the jurisdiction in which the entity is incorporated/domiciled (use global for global entities, e.g. UN)

___legal_form.description: legal form of organisation, e.g. municipality, government department, trust, etc

___publisher.description: The publisher/maintainer of the sanctions list

___other_attributes.description: Use for other attributes for which we don't yet have curated schema attributes

___source_url.description: Source url of the web page for the filing or if there is not persistent URL the page from which it can be found (e.g. search page). This field is required.

___end_date.description: Date on which the sanction ended, or is scheduled to end

___title.description: The title of the sanction entity record, if given

___sample_date.description: Date on which we know this to be true (for example the date the sanction list was published)

oneOf.name: sanction
oneOf.description: A sanction issued by a government or regulatory body to an entity to prevent it operating (e.g. disqualified director) or ban others from dealing with it (e.g. a OFAC sanctioned entity).

___cause.description: reasons for the sanction being applied

___sanction_jurisdictions.description: list of jurisdictions that this sanction applies to

___restrictions.description: conditions or restrictions on the sanctions

___retrieved_at.description: Date-time this was retrieved from the source

___start_date.description: Date on which the sanction started

___url.description: Persistent URL for the sanctioned entity record, if there is one

___uid.description: Unique id/reference for the sanctioned entity record if the sanctioning body has given it one

$eref.description: The sanctions list from which this entry is taken
$eref.title: Sanctions List

___jurisdiction.description: The jurisdiction covered by the register

___url.description: The URL of the sanctions list

___title.description: The title of the sanctions list

___publisher.description: The publisher/maintainer of the sanctions list

___category.description: Category of sanction. This field is required (other options may be added in the future). A listed_sanctioned_entity is an entity that is on a national or international sanctions list, e.g. OFAC
